attributes.action: lower the price of petrol it is now unacceptably to high and should be lowered
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as the most taxed race in the western race i think steps should be taken to lower the crippling price of petrol either by lowering the duty or persuading the oil companies to lower their prices as i we can not go on paying such high prices i think we should start blockading the oil terminals again and stop buying from shell/BP and only buy from supermarket forecourts this would force the big 2 shell and BP to lower the price of fuel if no one is buying theirs something must be done and quick otherwise we should consider a change of goverment

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
